languages.manage.help: Language stored in database are used to store translations for database entity like group names, portal titles, ... Limiting the list of languages to the minimum simplify admin console entry forms.
language.name: Idioma
layerNameTooltip: A layer name from the GetCapabilities document
translations.synch.all.help: For each db languages, check a key exist and add it if necessary.
chooseACatalogRecord: Elegir un registro de tipo catálogo
siblingListToAdd: Lista de enlaces a registros a añadir
remoteRecordUrl-help: Se puede enlazar un registro remoto en este catálogo apuntando a la URL del registro remoto. Si el registro remoto está en un catálogo GeoNetwork se recomienda usar  la página inicial del registro (p. ej.  https://catalog/geonetwork/srv/api/records/{uuid}). Para GeoNode se podría usar la página HTML del registro. Para otros tipos de catálogo se puede utilizar el documento XML (p. ej. una llamada a una API o una petición GetRecordById de CSW).
remoteRecordPropertiesError: No se pudo extraer el título y el UUID del registro remoto. Verifique el documento de destino.
remoteRecordUrlReturnedError: El acceso a esta URL ha fallado:
ui-defaultToolAfterMapLoad-help: User can open a map from different location (eg. home page maps, record view, map selector panel, URL). Define which tool panel to open by default after map is loaded. Can be empty to not activate any tool. 'layers' or 'legend' allows to easily view the list of layers in the map.
ui-languageStrategy-help:
Language strategy can be:
  • searchInAllLanguages: search using any.* fields (more records are returned)
  • searchInDetectedLanguage: restrict the search to the language detected based on user search. If language detection fails, search in all languages.
  • searchInThatLanguage: Force a language using searchInThatLanguage:fre (recommended if only one language used)
  • searchInUILanguage: search in UI languages eg. full text field is any.langfre if French
ui-languageWhitelist-help: Limit language detection to some languages only. If empty, the list of languages in catalogue records is used and if none found, mods.header.languages is used.
ui-queryBase-help: For a simple full text search on all fields use '${any}'. To give more importance to the title, use '${any} resourceTitleObject.default:(${any})^2'. See the documentation for more details. Use '${searchLang}' to set the detected language or '${uiLang}' for the user interface language.
anyFieldTitle: Búsqueda. Escribe para recibir sugerencias. Utilice " para buscar frases y coincidencias exactas, por ejemplo "reference grid". Utilice q() para consultas avanzadas, p. ej.  q(-cl_status_text:obsolete)
facetIncludeFilter: Filtrar valores. La expresión regular se puede usar escribiendo '/Land.*/'
indexNotAvailable: ¡No hay servicio de búsqueda disponible actualmente!
ui-sortBy-help: Defina la opción de clasificación predeterminada. p.ej. 'relevance' para usar la puntuación de búsqueda calculada (ver configuración de puntuación) o 'dateStamp#desc' para devolver primero el último registro actualizado.
csw-sortByHelp: Define sort option for GetRecords query. This can solve issue for large sets where some records may change on the remote node during harvesting and returned in different pages. Sorting by 'identifier:A' means by UUID with alphabetical order. Any CSW queryables can be used in combination with A or D for setting the ordering.
inspireApiQuotaCurrentValue: JRC INSPIRE validator API usage information
facet-th_httpinspireeceuropaeumetadataco: Conjunto de datos de prioridad INSPIRE
top10IndexingErrors: Los 10 errores de indexación más comunes:
rebuildIndexHelp: Cuando se está reconstruyendo el índice la búsqueda podría devolver resultados incompletos y la operación GetRecords puede mostrarse como deshabilitada (si se ha seleccionado la opción en la configuración). Usa esta función cuando el tráfico del catálogo sea bajo. Se recomienda reconstruir el índice desde aquí cuando se hayan hecho cambios directamente en la base de datos. Si se cambia la configuración del índice (fichero records.json) hay que usar 'Borrar índice y reindexar'.
indexInEsDoneError: Hay un error con el índice. Consulte los logs para obtener más detalles
indexCommit-help: Usar solo si la tarea de indexación está bloqueada.
indexCommitError: Error al realizar cambios en el índice.
ui-moreLikeThisConfig-help: Configuration must have a more_like_this.like which will be set with the record title to search for similar records. (See Elasticsearch API).
ui-moreLikeThisFilter-help:
Optional filter expression to apply on the more like this query (eg. 
-cl_status.key:(obsolete OR historicalArchive OR superseded)
to exclude obsolete records).
ui-autocompleteConfig-help: La configuración debe tener un query.multi_match.query que se configurará en el autocompletado.
ui-facetConfig-help: This configuration is used to display facets, using either terms aggregations or filters. See the documentation for more information.
searchBadRequest: La consulta devolvió un error. Consulte la consola para obtener más detalles.
searchInvalidResponse: La consulta devolvió una respuesta no válida. Consulte la consola para obtener más detalles.
exactMatch-help: La coincidencia exacta significa que se agrega '"' a los términos de búsqueda.
featuresInMapExtent: Features in current map extent only
heatmapAvailableForPointOnly: Heatmap only supported for point layer.
wfsDeleteWfsIndexingError: Se produjo un error al eliminar la tarea.
wfsIndexingTriggerError: Se produjo un error al iniciar la tarea.
clearCheckboxFormChanges: Limpiar el estado de las casillas modificadas. Las casillas con '-' significan que esos valores se eliminarán de la selección.
addThoseCategories-help: Añada (marcado con +) o elimine (casilla de verificación con -) categorías seleccionadas.
replaceByThoseCategories-help: Elimine las categorías del registro y luego agregue (marcado con +) o elimine (casilla de verificación con -) las categorías seleccionadas.
clearValidationStatus: Resetear el estado de las validaciones
addThoseOperations-help: Agregue (marcado con +) o elimine (casilla de verificación con -) los privilegios seleccionados.
privilegesNeededForPublicationRecordGrou: To publish a record, you need to be administrator or reviewer of record group
To publish a record, you need to be administrator or reviewer of record group or reviewer of a group with editing rights.
replaceByThoseOperations-help: Elimine los privilegios del registro y luego agregue (marcado con +) o elimine (casilla de verificación con -) los privilegios seleccionados.
ui-moreLikeThisSameType: More like this suggest records of the same type
ui-showPortalSwitcher: Display portal menu in top menu
ui-dateFormat-help: Formato de las fechas en la vista predeterminada del registro.
ui-locationThesaurus-help: Place keywords to be displayed below the map preview
ui-internalThesaurus-help: Keywords to be displayed only for authenticated users. Usually thesaurus used for management purposes only.
ui-collectionTableConfig: For series, configure column of datasets table list
ui-timezone: Zona horaria de la interfaz de usuario
ui-timezone-help: La zona horaria que se utilizará para representar la fecha en la vista predeterminada y la opción que se agregará al selector de fecha del editor. Si no es necesario manejar varias zonas horarias en el catálogo, establezca este valor en la zona horaria del servidor (consulte Consola de administración > Configuración). 'brower' utilizará la zona horaria del navegador.
wpsOutputAsReference-help: Request response as a URL (which will be available for download on success).
wpsLoadReferenceInMap-help: Try to download the reference URL with the response and load it on the map (needs to be GeoJSON response).
ui-wpsSource-help: An ordered array of 'list' (see list of service for WPS type), 'url' (user can put a URL) or 'recent' (recent WPS service used are stored in browser local storage).
translationPackClearCache-help: Required if you change JSON translation files of the Javascript application in catalog/locale, database translations or schema JSON translations.
translationPackCacheClearFailure: Error occurred while clearing translation packs cache!
ui-queryTitleExactMatch: Exact match query on title only
facets.temporalRange.help:
Drag out a brush to select a data range or click on a bar on the lower chart. Click out the selected range to unset. Click the filter button to search.

Blue series: current search, Grey series: all records.
facets.temporalRange.seriesLegend: Blue series: current search, Grey series: all records
indexStatusSynchronized-error: When number of records is not equal in the database and in the index, check first that the catalogue point to the correct index. If yes, try to reindex the catalogue from admin > tools. If there is still a difference, check for indexing errors in the log file and fix the metadata record using the XML view.
inspireValidationUsingPortalOnlyForPubli: INSPIRE validation from a portal is only available for public records (directly accessible using CSW service).
noINSPIRETestTokenAvailable: INSPIRE validator returned an empty token. Validation status can't be checked now. Check you configuration and API key or retry later.
system/localrating/notificationLevel-hel: Define which users to alert in case of rating.
system/inspire/remotevalidation/apikey-h: Users and organisations interested in receiving an API key will need to contact the Validator team by sending an e-mail to JRC-INSPIRE-SUPPORT AT ec.europa.eu and provide the following information: name of the organisation, responsible contact point and intended use of the API key.
system/inspire/remotevalidation/nodeid: Portal identifier to use for the validation
system/inspire/remotevalidation/nodeid-h: If null, the record is uploaded to the validator, if a node is defined, then the CSW url of this node is used, the validator will make a GetRecordById request to retrieve the record. Only applicable for public records.
system/security/password/allowAdminReset: If a mail server is configured, then users can reset password directly. For security reason, enable this option only if there is no mail server configured.
ui/chooseAnOption-help: Current user configuration is empty. Choose one or more option above or create a full configuration.
ui-full-configuration: All default options (reset all current options)
ui-hitsPerPage: Número predeterminado de registros por página
ui-related: Results / Type of related records to search for
pageIcon-help: Optionally, define a font-awesome icon. Example: 'fa-wrench'.
searchAllLanguages-help: Define which language is giving priorities to some records.
cite.format.ris.help: Tag format developed by Research Information Systems.
cite.format.bibtex.help: A BibTeX database file is formed by a list of entries, with each entry corresponding to a bibliographical item.
searchAndReplaceEditsHelp: Use the database to run a search and replace operation.
regexpFlags: Regular expression flags (depends on the database used)
regexpFlags-n: allows the period to match the newline character
harvesterConfigIsNotJson: The harvester config must be a JSON configuration.
harvesterConfigIsNotValid: The harvester config does not look to be a valid configuration.
toggleOptions: Toggle filter options (open or close filter tree)
ui-showMosaic: Show overview mosaic in home page
ui-showMaps: Show latest maps in home page
batchEditConfigIsNotValid:
Batch edit configuration is invalid. It must be a JSON 
{"insertMode": "gn_add", "xpath": "...", "value": "..."}
batchEditConfigIsNotJson: Batch edit configuration is not JSON.
wmstime-info: Browse {{layerName}} over time. This dataset provides data for {{instantNumber}} dates from {{start}} to {{end}}.
wmselevation-info: Browse {{layerName}} elevation dimension. This dataset provides data for {{instantNumber}} elevations from {{start}} to {{end}}.
chooseFileToUpload: Choose or drop a file here
atom.title: Título
atom.author: Autor
uploadedResourceAlreadyExistException: File {{file}} already exist in this record data store. Remove it first.
uploadNetworkErrorException: File {{file}} failed to upload due to network error or connection reset.
staticPageFormat-HTML: HTML content displayed embedded in the app
staticPageFormat-HTMLPAGE: HTML content displayed in a new browser tab
staticPageStatus-GROUPS: Visible to users belonging to the groups
pageSection-help: Currently, the default UI view only supports TOP and FOOTER values. Custom UI views can make use of additional values.
filterHelp: Please click on one of the buttons below to activate the filter
